Uses of Class
yaak.agent.communication.CommunicationException

Packages that use CommunicationException
yaak.agent This package implements agent operations. 
yaak.agent.communication This package implements lower level communications services. 
yaak.agent.communication.jdmk This package implements a JDMK-based communications server. 
yaak.agent.communication.jmx This package implements a JMX-based communications server. 
yaak.agent.message This package implements higher level, agent-to-agent messaging. 
 

Uses of CommunicationException in yaak.agent
 

Methods in yaak.agent that throw CommunicationException
 void Agent.publishMessage(java.lang.String address, Message message)
          Publishes a message to the specified address, usually a context.

          Sends a message to the specified agent.
 Message Agent.receiveMessage(java.lang.String sender)
          Receives a message from the specified agent.
 Message Agent.receiveMessage(AgentAddress sender)
          Receives a message from the specified agent.
